Other Information.Additional Info: The dense root part of the Ni-CAT nanorods array plays a significant role in blocking lithium polysulfides.
The Ni-CAT material facilitates fast Li+ diffusion due to its porous structure and good conductivity.

Sieving Mechanism: Difference in diffusion rates between lithium polysulfides and lithium ions within the MOF channels.

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, adsorption tests, permeation tests, electrochemical measurements
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Li2S6 adsorption capacity significantly higher than CNT; PP separator allows LPS penetration within 3h while Ni-CAT/CNTF blocks it effectively.

Other Information.Additional Info: Ni-CAT exhibits strong adsorption towards lithium polysulfides (Li2S2 Ead = -2.43 eV; Li2S6 Ead = -1.41 eV) and promotes catalytic conversion of sulfur species.
